name: Dash&Dot
description:
Dash&Dot is a small design agency based in rural Herefordshire. They design bespoke brands, build beautiful websites and craft unique animations that make their clients happy.Â 

They design and build great looking websites from the ground up in collaboration with their clients, ensuring that the website truly reflects the client and their brand. Dash&Dot utilize the latest responsive design techniques to ensure every project is not only mobile-friendly, but fast, functional and distinct.
